paragraphs.zh-tw: （音樂）你我並立有如亞當與夏娃瀑布湍流宛若置身伊甸園兩個墜入愛河的小傻瓜如此美麗和堅強林間的鳥兒朝他們微笑從恐龍時代起車燃燒著汽油前進哪裏？它們去了哪裏？現在，只有花兒猶在這裏曾是間工廠現在這裏是水秀山青你看見了嗎，你看見了嗎我們抓住一條響尾蛇我們有了晚餐你看見了嗎，你看見了嗎這裏曾是塊停車場現在已被鮮花覆蓋你看見了嗎，你看見了嗎如果這裏是天堂我多麼希望有台割草機你看見了嗎，你看見了嗎這裏曾是個購物城現在是一片玉米田你看見了嗎，你看見了嗎別留我一個人在此蹉跎歲月我還沒習慣這樣的生活Thomas Dolby:David Byrne。
paragraphs.en: (Music) ♫ Here we stand ♫ ♫ Like an Adam and an Eve ♫ ♫ Waterfalls ♫ ♫ The Garden of Eden ♫ ♫ Two fools in love ♫ ♫ So beautiful and strong ♫ ♫ Birds in the trees ♫ ♫ Are smiling upon them ♫ ♫ From the age of the dinosaurs ♫ ♫ Cars would run on gasoline ♫ ♫ Where? Where have they gone? ♫ ♫ Now, there's nothing but flowers ♫ ♫ This was a factory ♫ ♫Now there are mountains and rivers ♫ ♫ You got it, you got it ♫ ♫ We caught a rattlesnake ♫ ♫ Now we've got something for dinner ♫ ♫ You got it, you got it ♫ ♫ This was a parking lot ♫ ♫ Now it's all covered with flowers ♫ ♫ You got it, you got it ♫ ♫ If this is paradise ♫ ♫ I wish I had a lawnmower ♫ ♫ You got it, you got it ♫ ♫ This was a shopping mall ♫ ♫ Now it's turned into corn field ♫ ♫ You got it, you got it ♫ ♫ Don't leave me stranded here ♫ ♫ I can't get used to this lifestyle ♫ Thomas Dolby: David Byrne.

title: David Byrne Sings Nothing But Flowers
